scripts.build: parcel build --no-source-maps --detailed-report --no-content-hash src/task-*.js src/on-task-*.js src/create-todo-structure*.js src/*.html
scripts.watch: parcel watch --no-source-maps src/task-*.js src/on-task-*.js src/create-todo-structure*.js src/*.html
